messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant with access to tools. When the user asks you to read files, use the read tool.
Read the package.json file and tell me what dependencies are listed

function.name: read
function.description: Reads a file from the local filesystem

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to read

offset.description: The line number to start reading from

limit.description: The number of lines to read
